Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2011 01:16PM parvatim wrote: So glad to have found you all. I start my 5 days tomorrow with the Savi implant. Wondering about nutritional does and don'ts during treatment. The device was put in 3 days ago, two days after an "extended Lumpectomy" to get better margins (altho original margins were clear,some were only 1mm). Any advice for this week?
Posts.Title: SAVI breast brachytherapy - 5 day ktab96 DebConway
